en:
首先
(Shǒuxiān)

First of all

Definitions of 首先
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

adjective
    first
        第一, 首先, 初, 首, 头, 最初

adverb
    first of all
        首先
    above all
        首先
    in the first place
        首先, 当初, 压, 压根儿
